instructions: Swipe down from the top of your screen to reveal the Notification Shade . Tap on the Settings button in the top right corner (looks like a gear). Tap on the Date and time button (bottom of the settings screen). Swipe to reveal your Notification Shade, tap on Settings, and tap on Date and time. Toggle the Automatic date and time switch left to be able to manually set the time. Tap on Set Date to launch a calendar. Tap on the date you would like to set your phone to. Toggle the automatic date and time slider off, tap on set date, and tap on a date. Tap on done to save your changes. Tap on set time to launch a clock roll. Scroll through the rollers to set the hour, minute, and AM/PM. Tap on done, tap on set time, and scroll through the clock rollers. Tap on done to save the time. Tap on Select time zone to launch a list of timezone options. Tap on a time zone you would like to set your phone to. Tap on done, tap on select time zone, and tap on a time zone.
